lore: Immediately after the Djinn uprising, Vulcanar visited Zonte and his teacher to propose a deal. Apparently, seeing a Djinn Pyromancer had given him an idea. In exchange for his help to take back to Refuge of the Magi, they would help him create the Efreets. As long as there is a fire, the Ashbone Efreet can alter its movement and duration at will. If it sees a fire break out, it will use its powers to prevent anyone from extinguishing it.
menagerieDialog: I have a confession to make. I accidentally set one of the other creatures on fire earlier while you were away.
You can catch just about anything on fire if you set your mind to it, really.
Many people often confuse Efreets with Djinns. The difference between the two is that Efreets are much smarter and more handsome than Djinns.
Fire solves everything. If you need me to take care of someone for you, just say the word.
name: Ashbone Efreet
